short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clipboard history and management for ChromeOS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Similar to Parcellite, ClipMenu, Klipper and the Gnome Clipboard Indicator.

Caches the clipboard history, keeping track of what you copy and allowing you to select it to paste in a different order or perform basic search.

Supports selecting an item using the keyboard or mouse; available options are changing the number of items shown and how many characters are shown in the preview. Caches everything to Chrome's local storage to survive between reboots by default, but this can be disabled, too.

Mostly made to meet my own needs, and doesn't require any dangerous permissions.
